website_summaries.verdict: One of the best utility carts you can buy, this professional-grade product offers supreme weight capacity and durability.
pros: The large model has the ability to hold 750 pounds, but there is also an option to purchase cart in medium or small
Customers appreciated the smooth, powerful wheels
cons: Only 2 of the 4 wheels are on casters that spin

customer_reviews.title: Great service cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cart to lug around all my tools and personal items with me. I work in construction and currently doing a renovation job in a building, so I'm not in one area, room, floor, etc for to long. Cart seems pretty solid so far, a lot of space for my tool box, extension cords, tools that I use often and the most important tool of all..... my cooler! I had to order another for my friend after he seen mines.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Cart
customer_reviews.text: A great cart but there's two things I would like to see changed. I wish all of the wheels swiveled (instead of just two wheels). I also wish it was put together with bolts instead of screws. Something about driving a screw into plastic never seems right to me -- I'm worried that I'll strip the plastic when putting it together or, even if that goes ok, it seems like it will eventually rip through (and would then be hard to fix.) But as long as this doesn't happen I think this cart is quite nice!
customer_reviews.author: jmonty

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid 2-shelf utility cart
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! We are remolding our kitchen so, we put our everyday items on it, and can just roll everything out of the way as needed! My husband has one at work. He puts all of his tools on it and rolls it where he needs it - without making several trips back to his truck. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I didn’t want.
customer_reviews.text: Paid the $100 or more extra for the Quiet casters ( pneumatic wheels ). The box just showed up, labeled as having them inside, and that’s the only thing I was worried about so it’s the first thing I looked for after opening - and - NOPE! The standard casters are inside. I read numerous complaints of this happening and thought I had overchecked my order to be sure it wouldn’t be something I had messed up in ordering - but evidently Rubbermaid doesn’t QC their own shipments or something. Returning unless it can be fixed but I needed them for Monday morning and it’s Friday. And of course There’s no number to call anyone.
customer_reviews.author: OSKA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed it for
customer_reviews.text: We needed a cart sturdy and large enough to hold a large, heavy freeze dryer. This was perfect! The appliance fits perfectly, and at over 100 pounds, this cart is up to the task. It was also easy to assemble and extremely easy to steer with the handles; a perfect choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: These have served us well as utility carts for cleaning and for mobile projects such as mobile label printing stations around our warehouses. Great build quality, could do with locking casters, but we operate on flat surfaces away from traffic so not a big deal. Will purchase again should we need to.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Holguin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and deal
customer_reviews.text: Pro contractor and electrician in my life love these It was an appreciated Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buchkowski

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice Heavy-Duty Cart!
customer_reviews.text: Totally met my expectations. Just a bit wider (IRL) than I expected, but still goes through household doorways fine. Raised handles keep me from hunching out. And the fact that they are setback keep me from kicking the bottom tray when I push it.
customer_reviews.author: DDuncan

customer_reviews.title: This cart is awesome! It is huge & will take one hell ...
customer_reviews.text: I work as a medical gas installer and plumber. This cart is awesome! It is huge & will take one hell of a beating. I bought a blemished model for around $150 & never could find the blemish (as if it mattered). It's a beast!
customer_reviews.author: McBeast

customer_reviews.title: Good quality very handy.
customer_reviews.text: I am an operations manager in a warehouse this is a great cart strong, maneuverable and easy to push even with heavy boxes on it. We use it a lot and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble, rolls smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble, rolls smooth. great for work and moving everything around on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I see these at work a lot, so I decided to buy one for home. It is used mainly for out doors whether to bring food out to the back yard or tools to fix stuff around the house. I like that is it plastic, and I don't have to worry about leaving it out doors year round.
customer_reviews.author: toubis

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: This works great everywhere, but i really like it in the kitchen... I also load it up with the stuff I need to do the outside grilling and just push it out to the grill without having to make a dozen trips back and forth...
customer_reviews.author: Zig

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my shop and my guys love it. Easy to put together and great for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my shop and my guys love it. Easy to put together and great for lugging around tools from job to job.
customer_reviews.author: Pelly

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't say this is easy to put together though
customer_reviews.text: very durable cart. I wouldn't say this is easy to put together though; definitely need a screw driver bit on a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: i bought 2 and the other cart it running perfect.
customer_reviews.text: the 360 tires are wiggle-ling too much, if somebody can contact me about this issue. is there a way to fix it or i just need a new set of tires. mind you, i bought 2 and the other cart it running perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Malaga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong product easy to keep clean, this was our second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great Rubbermaid product. Most useful and practical for transporting heavy stuff. Very strong, durable, easy to roll. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I was comparing price advertised and price charged, advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: I was comparing price advertised and price charged, advertised $195.00 actual charge over $216.00. Tax on $195.00 should be around $208.00. Just wondering why the difference. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ron Huettmann

customer_reviews.title: Don't be like me and put together my hand
customer_reviews.text: Rugged cart. Don't be like me and put together my hand...find a powered screw driver. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Electrician Tool Cart
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cart for electrical service. Bought 10" casters at Harbor Freight fit perfect and made it easier to roll around.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Shop Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my company; we use them for moving stock and finished goods around our production shop . They were easy to assemble, have plenty usable space on both shelves and can handle a lot of weight. The compartment on the top shelf is especially handy for holding tools and small parts. We will probably by more as we expand.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Utility cart
customer_reviews.text: . The only thing wrong is i should have ordered the black to match the black cleaning cart i ordered.I have experience with these from my job and they held up very well in that tough setting.I will be ordering an additional one for my business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial Heavy Duty 2-Shelf Utility Cart, Flat Handle, Flat Shelves, Medium, Beige (FG452589BEIG)
product_meta.description: Style:Flat Handle/Flat Shelf| Size:Medium| Color:BeigeHigh-density structural foam construction makes this service cart sturdy, lightweight and maneuverable, and won’t rust, dent, chip or peel. 4-inch non-marking thermoplastic rubber swivel casters absorb shock, run quiet and protect floors. Ideal for smooth surfaces. Adjustable-height, ergonomic push handle allows optimum placement for improved control and safety. Rounded corners protect walls and furniture. Molded-in storage compartments, holsters, hooks, and notches, customizable fittings and easy-access bottom shelf make space for all your tools. 500-pound capacity. Flat top shelf for oversized loads and smarter work surface. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: High-density structural foam construction makes this service cart sturdy, lightweight and maneuverable, and won’t rust, dent, chip or peel
4-inch non-marking thermoplastic rubber swivel casters absorb shock, run quiet and protect floors. Ideal for smooth surfaces
Adjustable-height, ergonomic push handle allows optimum placement for improved control and safety. Rounded corners protect walls and furniture
Molded-in storage compartments, holsters, hooks, and notches, customizable fittings and easy-access bottom shelf make space for all your tools
500-pound capacity. Flat top shelf for oversized loads and smarter work surface. Made in the USA
